mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT c.course_name AS "label", c.course_id AS "value" FROM course c JOIN teacher_class_course tcc on c.course_id = tcc.course_id WHERE t_id = #{tId};

SELECT p_id AS "paperId", p_name AS "paperName", course_name AS "courseName", SUBSTRING_INDEX(DATE_FORMAT(p_created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '.', 1) AS "createTime", t_name AS "createUser" FROM paper p LEFT JOIN course c on p.course_id = c.course_id LEFT JOIN teacher t on t.t_id = p.p_created_user WHERE p.p_id = COALESCE(#{paperId}, p.p_id) AND p.course_id = COALESCE(#{courseId}, p.course_id);
SELECT DISTINCT q.q_type FROM paper_question pq LEFT JOIN question q on q.q_id = pq.q_id WHERE pq.p_id = #{paperId} ORDER BY q.q_type;

SELECT * FROM question q LEFT JOIN `option` o on q.q_id = o.q_id WHERE q.q_id IN
#{questionId}

SELECT course_id AS "courseId", p_type AS "paperType", SUBSTRING_INDEX(DATE_FORMAT(p_start_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '.', 1) AS "startTime", SUBSTRING_INDEX(DATE_FORMAT(p_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '.', 1) AS "endTime", p_name AS "paperName", p_suggest_time AS "suggestTime" FROM paper WHERE p_id = #{paperId};
